Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Class RemoteView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observer.Observable<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.View.View
it.polimi.ingsw.View.RemoteView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<Message>
public class RemoteView
extends View
RemoteView extends the abstract class View. The Session instantiate a RemoteView for each Player. It observs Game (the model for the MVC pattern).
